tutorial_step_1_desc: Please use either Google Chrome or Firefox browser to install the DEXON Wallet to participate in the game. Click {here} for the DEXON wallet link.
tutorial_step_2: STEP 2. Get DXN Coins from DEXON Faucet
tutorial_step_2_desc: After installing the DEXON wallet, you can now get free DXN coins from our DEXON faucet. Click {here} for the DEXON Faucet link.
tutorial_step_3_desc: After receiving your DXN Coins, you can participate in the Slot Machine and Gachapon games.
tutorial_disclaimer_1: Any ACDX Tokens (“ACDX”) earned through Slot Machine on ArcadeX might not have any demands. DEXON Foundation or any of its affiliates is not responsible for the circulation and trading of ACDX on the market. ACDX, if traded on markets, usually have extremely volatile prices. Fluctuations in price over short periods of time frequently occur, which price may be denominated in Bitcoin, Ether, US Dollars or any other fiat currency. Such fluctuations could result from market forces (including speculations), regulatory changes, technical innovations, availability of exchanges, and other objective factors and represent changes in the balance of supply and demand.
tutorial_disclaimer_2: Users will receive virtual characters by playing GACHAPON. The odds of getting each character is shown under the “Collectibles” column of GACHAPON webpage.
tutorial_disclaimer_3: Users may receive character(s) he/she has already owned due to the mechanism of GACHAPON.
tutorial_disclaimer_4: Playing Slot Machine and GACHAPON is free of charge. However, users shall be responsible for transaction fee incurred for each transaction submitted to blockchain network. transaction fee shall be paid in DEXON Coins and the amount of transaction fee shall be determined by the complexity of smart contract code. You agree and understand that we will not be liable for any failed transactions due to insufficient transaction fee associated with your DEXON Wallet.
tutorial_disclaimer_5: System issues may result in an inability to play Slot Machine and GACHAPON. Neither DEXON Foundation nor its affiliates makes any guarantee of functionality, security, or availability of such decentralized applications.
tutorial_disclaimer_6: I further agree and acknowledge that I will be solely responsible for any costs and losses, directly or indirectly, arising out of my activities related to the use of ArcadeX.
